userUtterance.text: I'm reporting a flood in Khlong San district.

agentUtterance.text: Thank you for alerting us. Can you tell me the severity of the flooding and any immediate risks or damages?

playbookOutput.executionSummary: The agent initiated the Emergency_Report flow to collect detailed information about the flood incident, preparing for escalation to responders.

description: User wants to report a flood affecting their local area and is ready to provide details.
